column3: Set the colormap for 2D residual plots.
Define a list of radii at which circular graticules will be drawn.
Enable interactive mode.  If True then plots will be drawn after each plotting command.
TS threshold for labeling sources in sky maps.  If None then no sources will be labeled.

Display RA coordinates on sky maps as hour angle (hh:mm:ss) or decimal degrees.  Options: ``'hour'`` (default) or ``'deg'``.  Applies to all 2D sky maps (psmap, tsmap, residmap, tscube, localization, extension, ROI plots).  Can be overridden per method (e.g. in *psmap* config or by passing ``ra_format`` to map methods).
